code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/orit/Documents/CodingAcademy/spotify/frontend/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";export var INCREMENT='INCREMENT';export var SET_CURRENT_SONG='SET_CURRENT_SONG';export var ISPLAYING='ISPLAYING';export var SET_PLAYER="SET_PLAYER";export var SET_VOLUME='SET_VOLUME';var initialState={player:null,volume:0.5,currentSong:{"_id":"4m1EFMoRFvY","title":"Beyoncé - Single Ladies","description":"Beyoncé's official 'Single Ladies","tags":["Pop","Happy"],"imgUrl":"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4m1EFMoRFvY/hqdefault.jpg",currentTime:0},count:1,isPlaying:false};export function playerReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case INCREMENT:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{count:state.count+1});case SET_PLAYER:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{player:action.player});case SET_CURRENT_SONG:console.log("action",action);return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{currentSong:action.song});case ISPLAYING:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{isPlaying:!state.isPlaying});case SET_VOLUME:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{volume:action.volume});default:return _objectSpread({},state);}}
